description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'VratPage' used for managing the selection of vrats (fasts) and displaying a streak indicator, utilizing a mock repository for data.

classes.name: VratPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget managing vrats selection and display.

classes.name: _VratPageState
classes.description: State class handling logic and UI for VratPage.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state by fetching all vrats and selected vrats from the repository.

methods.name: _toggle
methods.description: Toggles the selection status of a given vrat by id.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the page, including a streak card and list of vrats.

methods.name: _streakCard
methods.description: Returns a widget displaying the current streak information.
